body.name: Miroir L300 1080p (Native Resolution) Full HD LCD Portable Projector, Built-in Speaker, LED Lamp, 2x HDMI
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: Get ready for an immersive movie experience in the comfort of your own home with the best viewing conditions for your L300 projector - a dark or semi-lit room. This environment enhances the vividness and brightness of the images, delivering a captivating movie experience. So turn down the lights, sit back and enjoy the show with the L300.

Unleash the true potential of your favorite movies with the L300's stunUnleash the true potential of your favorite movies with the L300's stunning Full HD 1080p native resolution. With a 1920 x 1080p resolution, this projector delivers sharp, detailed images that bring your movies to life with unparalleled realism. Experience the subtle textures, vivid colors, and intricate details in every frame like never before with the L300.

Say goodbye to the hassle of frequent lamp replacements with the L300 Portable Projector. Boasting up to 20,000 hours of viewing, this projector is built to last and provide you with endless entertainment. No more interruptions to your movie nights or video sharing, sit back and enjoy the show with the durable and reliable L300.

Easily connect your devices with the L300's HDMI (2) & USB Type A Jack (2). Power up your streaming sticks like Fire Stick, Chromecast, ROKU, and more with the USB Type A Jack. Enjoy seamless audio with the 3.5mm Audio Out. The L300 is your go-to for effortless entertainment.

Get everyone in on the action with the L300's built-in 3-watt speakers (2). No more straining to hear, everyone can enjoy the audio. Elevate your movie nights with the L300. Fine-tune your viewing experience with the L300's adjustable Keystone (+/- 15 degrees) and Manual Focus. Get the perfect picture every time, no matter the setting. Experience a seamless setup with the L300.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Full HD 1080p Native Resolution Your favorite photos and movies were meant to be viewed in HD! Share them anywhere with the L300 LCD 1080p Projector. Compatible with Fire Stick, Chromecast, ROKU and other TV sticks. USB Type A jack will power your favorite streaming stick. Integrated Kickstand The L300 portable projector's integrated kickstand makes viewing on any wall simple and easy. Includes keystone (+/- 15 degrees) and manual focus. Big Screen in a Small Space Gaming, movie night, you name it! In an instant, the L300 creates up to a 80" screen wherever you go. Instead of settling for your favorite content on your smartphone or laptop screen, bring immersive, cinematic viewing anywhere, anytime. LCD Lamp Technology The L300 uses LED Lamp technology providing up to 20,000 viewing hours with 300 lumens of brightness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector to threw up and watch at night.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is a really great projector for the value. I use it where I don't have a TV and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A solid projector for a small, dark "hideout" room that my son likes to play in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was lucky enough to get mine on sale after tax it was $37.00 once I got it I was impressed by the packaging and the projector materials. Then I turned it on and I was blown away by the color accuracy and sharpness of the picture. This is my 5th projector and by far the cheapest it holds its own against my $800 projector i bought in march this year 2023. To say im impressed is a gross understatement. Without a doubt if you are looking for a 1080p projector just buy this you can't go wrong for the price. I promise you will not have any regrets! Thank you miroir for having such an amazing product at a price everyone can afford!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low brightness and dust...
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Miroir L300 in June, and since then I have used it for a few movie nights and sports nights.Picture Quality is okay at the price range it was in June of 2022, around $100, but it's not going to compare to a TV or a name-brand projector like Epson or BenQ.Brightness is a big issue with this projector, and most of these cheaper end projectors, because of their light source. They also use LCD lumens instead of ANSI Lumens, that's something to pay attention to as the big brands use ANSI which usually means the image is brighter. Playing video games where there are dark areas is almost impossible, even in Fortnite it was darker in spots than I care for and that game is cartoon colored. Speaking of cartoons, that is where this projector does its best work, cartoons or kids' movies that are brightly colored, we enjoyed Spongebob Squarepants and Up on it.The sound quality was decent, I was pleasantly surprised when I could hear everything I needed to hear in whatever I watched without resorting to using a different speaker, although a Bluetooth or 3.5mm stereo speaker option is definitely better than the internal.I knew at the price I paid that it wasn't going to be the latest, greatest technology when Epson and BenQ are going for 600+, so I don't have a lot of complaints on that, but it suffers the same problem as Vankyo, they get dust in them even if you keep them in their box and covered. By the third use, the projected image had a spec or two of dust and there's no way into the internals to get that dust-out. From experience with Vankyo, I know canned air is just going to make it worse and you are stuck with the dust specs and it's horrible. I keep bringing up Vankyo because I wouldn't be surprised if these are made in the same factory, they have almost identical software, except for some reason Miroir chooses not to allow you to change any settings having to do with brightness, color, etc where Vankyo usually allows it.Yet, for the price paid, I think I got my monies worth out of it, a couple of sports events at 80" and a half dozen movies too, I would have spent more at a sports bar or the movie theater for this size screen than I did for this device.If you are looking for something to dip your toe into projectors or just for a few movie nights and aren't going to be disappointed by needing an almost completely dark room and still having a sometimes dark image and dust specs, this could be for you. Don't knock it until you try it I guess, but I tried it and kind of wish I had waited on something better. Since they don't allow half stars I'm giving the device a 3 out of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for an inexpensive projector- too bad it died on 3rd day
reviews.reviewText: The projector was bright/clear enough to take my fire stick outside to enjoy. The third time I used it, it made a pop sound from the speaker and the light cut off. Now it just turns on with no audio or video output and even the internal fan stopped running. It’s really cheaply made but, the output is fine for taking a movie outside with the kiddo’s. Just make sure you test it well during the first 30 days as they may not be built well enough to stand the test of time. For me, 3 days was not acceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works super nicely, there really isn’t any cons. Perfect for movie nights or video games! Way better than any TV I’ve had. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Screen burn in right at the 1 year mark
reviews.reviewText: Projector was decent but doesn’t have any settings so you can’t change any image setting not to mention literally right around the one year mark of buying this projector the bulb now has burn in and has a huge brown circle on the left half of the screen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: El producto según el precio es muy funcional, fácil de instalar,ha respondido muy bien. El control solo lo he podido usar para apagarlo o controlar el volumen. Excelente producto calidad -precio. Lo utilizo para dar clases
